title: Forum - Introduction and FAQ
description:
The forum is a place where you can ask other members for support, but can you can also post a guide/documentation, or just start a discussion.
If you want to get support from our staff you can open a ticket instead.

fields.name: A quick reminder
fields.value:: Before creating a post, check if there is already another one on the same topic, if you don't find a solution to your problem you can create your own post.

fields.name: Should i use the forum or open a ticket?
fields.value:: We suggest posting in this forum first, and if you still don't find a way to fix your problem you can open a ticket and ask our staff directly.

fields.name: Why shouldn't i always use tickets?
fields.value:: Tickets can only be made for issues directly related to our service, while the forum can be used to create any kind of post.
